alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 10 at 5:21PM CDT until June 10 at 6:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: The National Weather Service in Memphis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Chickasaw County in northeastern Mississippi... Southeastern Calhoun County in northeastern Mississippi... * Until 600 PM CDT. * At 521 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Vardaman, or 11 miles southwest of Houston, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Houston, Vardaman, Derma, Pyland, Trebloc, Woodland, Sparta, Thorn, Parkersburg, Thelma, Tabbville, McCondy, Anchor and Atlanta. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
